edu.rpi.phil.legup
Class BoardState

java.lang.Object
  edu.rpi.phil.legup.BoardState
public class BoardState
extends java.lang.Object

Stores all the information related to a board state. Contains the cell values, label values, transitions to and from the state, and any applied rules associated with this state.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Drew Housten

getCellValue

public int getCellValue(int row,
                        int col,
                        int branchNumber)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Gets the cell value at a particular row and column. This function will take transition cells from the state into account

Parameters:
row - Row of the cell
col - Column of the cell
branchNumber - The branch number to get the cell value for
Returns:
Cell Value
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the row or column is invalid

getLabel

public int getLabel(int labelLocation,
                    int pos)
             throws java.lang.Exception
Gets the value for one of the labels. labelLocation should be either LABEL_TOP, LABEL_BOTTOM,LABEL_LEFT, or LABEL_RIGHT

Parameters:
labelLocation - Location of the label in relation to the board
pos - The position of the particular label value
Returns:
The label value
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the pos or labelLocation are invalid

                     int pos,
                     int value)
              throws java.lang.Exception
Sets the value for one of the labels. labelLocation should be either LABEL_TOP, LABEL_BOTTOM,LABEL_LEFT,or LABEL_RIGHT

Parameters:
labelLocation - Location of the label in relation to the board
pos - The position of the particular label value
value - The new label value
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the pos or labelLocation are invalid

addTransitionFrom

public void addTransitionFrom(TransitionCell transitionCell)
Adds a transition from this board state.

Parameters:

removeTransitionFrom

copy

public BoardState copy()
Makes a copy of the current board state.

Returns:
New BoardState that is a copy of this board state

merge

public BoardState merge(BoardState copyState,
                        boolean replace)
Merges two board states. If the replace flag is true, this state becomes the merged state. Any cell value that is the same in both parents carries over while any disagreeing cell becomes the value of 0.

Parameters:
copyState - The state that should be merged with this one
replace - If this is true, the current state becomes the merged state
Returns:
The merged state

compareBoard

public boolean compareBoard(BoardState compareBoard)
Compares two boards. If all the cell values match, it will return true.

Parameters:
compareBoard - BoardState to compare to
Returns:
True if the board states match

printStatus

public void printStatus()
Prints the status of the board state to the console.

printBoard

public void printBoard()
Prints the board to the console

addAppliedRule

public void addAppliedRule(AppliedRule rule)
Adds an applied rule to the board state. An applied rule is an edge from this board state to a new state.

Parameters:
rule - AppliedRule to add

getAppliedRules

public java.util.Vector getAppliedRules()
Gets a Vector of all the applied rules from this board state.

Returns:
Vector of AppliedRules
